description:
Sleek and effective, this comfortable hoodie keeps you moving in cold weather. Thermo-regulating technology adjusts your body temperature to warm your core without overheating, and wicking fabric prevents chills when you're working hard.

  • Wicking polyester blend has plenty of stretch for freedom of movement
  • ActiveTemp technology regulates temperature to keep you warm without overheating
  • 3-panel hood, thumb loops and a drop-tail hem provide coverage on chilly adventures
  • Fabric has UPF 32 sun protection
  • Interior mesh pocket fits a phone
name: Outdoor Research Melody Full Zip Hoodie Plus - Women's
